name: Rindr
description: Rindr is a platform for students of FH Salzburg to share and find rides to and from university. You automatically see suggested rides based on your home address.

name: Dycards
description: Dycards is a modern, interactive flashcard app built in Rails. It features various question types such as multiple choice, single choice or open answer.

name: Vienna Metro Map
description: An interactive map showing Vienna's metro lines using the official realtime API provided by Wiener Linien. Click on a station too see live departures and trains moving on the line!

name: darts.io
description: A web app for remotely exchanging darts scores with your friends in real time. Simply click on the fields you hit and the scores recalculate accordingly.
